headline: Should You Buy Take-Two Stock Around $235?
summary: Take-Two stock is rising on high sales expectations for an upcoming release.  Analysts expect sales of "Grand Theft Auto VI" to lift Take-Two's revenue by 52% in fiscal 2027.  Strong sales of add-on content and in-game spending could lead to significantly higher margins and earnings.
